name: Finansforbundet
goal: The Financial Services Union Denmark is the trade union for employees in the Danish financial sector. We have approximately 50000 members in all financial and fintech industry segments. Our primary goal is to take care of our members' rights and interests. Also, we have an interest in a sound and well-functioning financial sector.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Financial regulation, Fintech, digitalisation, Capital markets union, Financial taxation, financial supervision, refit, European Semester, corporate governance, employee information, consultation and participation, European Works Councils, European Services Card
